name: perseveration
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of saying or doing something repeatedly when there is no longer any reason to do so: Many of the errors that the children made consisted of verbal substitutions and perseverations. Perseveration may be a sign that a child is on the autism spectrum.
More examplesFewer examplesPlease do not test our patience with your endless perseverations.The patient's symptoms included perseveration, sleep disorder, and severe lethargy.He sometimes spoke very loudly, and at other times he exhibited perseveration.
